text:
the regard test hangs at NullURITest on dual-proc w2k/prof sp4 using JRE 1.4.2_04.
works fine with one processor. Code in JSVGComponent involved in detaching a
document has not enough volatile members for my taste.
creator: info@dvholten.de
deweese@apache.org
text:
I agree that it is possible there is an issue here.
I am not going to attempt to fix the problem before the release.
The risk of causing problems is greater than the current
problem.

I don't think just adding volatile would be sufficent 
synchronization needs to be added.

creator: info@dvholten.de
text:
bug hasnt been observed since more than a year, running jdk 1.3, 1.4, 1.5 on
single or dual cpus.
i declare it closed
